00070 class Light {

00072

00077 
00082         Light(const VecMath::Vector<4> &pos,
00083               const Color &a, const Color &d, const Color &s):
00084             _lightSource(pos, a, d, s) { }
00085 
00087 
00090         virtual void render() const = 0;
00091 
00092     protected:
00093 
00095         virtual const VecMath::Vector<4> &getPosition() const {
00096             return _lightSource.getPosition();
00097         }

00100             return _lightSource.getAmbient();
00101         }

00104             return _lightSource.getDiffuse();
00105         }

00108             return _lightSource.getSpecular();
00109         }
